products.title: Sprinkle Solar Lime Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: A fun geometric-design, sprinkle solar comes in several shades. Perfect for adding modern splashes of colour to your home. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric. Product id: db-pls0140 fabric colour: lime material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Infusion Solar Lime Green Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar lime green pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0087 fabric colour: lime green headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Roller, 4079 Olive Green - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1266 Luscious Lime - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1266 luscious lime - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.
